thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Girlie weekend
thread.title_full: Girlie weekend - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hayley B
title: Girlie weekend
text: Visited last weekend with my friend, hotel was everything you would expect from a premier inn, clean and comfortable. Hotel is perfect location for Euston station and a great base for exploring the city. Hotel room was warm and the air con wasn't the most efficient, the windows open in the room which is fab as long as you can sleep through the traffic noise. Would definitely recommend the hotel and will visit again
